_description: ‘Passio sancti Bartholomei appostoli’ (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint berthelmeu als crist cummandvnto þe puple went prechand…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …vnto wham be ay loueingand till his blis us all he bring
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Passio sancti Bartholomei appostoli x v (rubric, f. 173rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 119-23.
